metadata.title: CVE-2020-25657 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in all released versions of m2crypto, where they arevulnerable to Bleichenbacher timing attacks in the RSA decryption API viathe timed processing of valid PKCS#1 v1.5 Ciphertext. The highest threatfrom this vulnerability is to confidentiality.

criterions.comment: m2crypto: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
